item.description:
Hello guys,

We're changing it up this week and offering D&D with a twist: the Castle Ravenloft board game. It encapsulates the 4th Ed. D&D experience into a self-contained board game that recreates (quite well if I do say so myself) the gothic horror experience of the original Castle Ravenloft adventure. There are a number of scenarios that can be played in the game, whether it's a daylight assault to steal Strahd's treasures or an epic battle against Strahd himself to once and for all end his evil reign over the land of Barovia.

The other game being presented is Betrayal at House on the Hill. This is another dungeon exploration game, though this is set in a classic haunted mansion with evil scientists, cursed ghosts, and other horrors awaiting those who enter the abode.

The plan is to have two tables of players play a scenario in each game, then switch off and try the other. Each game takes an hour or two to play through a particular scenario, so the whole event will likely run 3-4 hours with a short break in the middle. Hope to see you guys there.

Sincerely,

Tanios
item.name: Castle Ravenloft: The Board Game & Betrayal at House on the Hill
